stories.text:
Hi, I'm a Product Designer and I've had this idea for about two years but never had the time to work on it until now. The idea is basically combining the subreddits r/RoastMe & r/ToastMe into one app with some other features still in the ideation stage. Let me know what you guys think of the landing page at https://roastortoast.me so far.

If you have any questions or would like to join me in exploring this idea, feel free to drop me an email at contact@roastortoast.me
stories.title: Ask HN: Thoughts on This Idea

stories.text: Hey! I'm Julia. I am with my team making the startup from the field of cybersecurity and trying to understand how to determine our product-market fit. Maybe any advice?

stories.text:
I’m excited to share with you a recent project me and my team have been developing.

We created a tool that helps you find out where a product has been launched. We made sure that’s done in an easy and simple way. Now we’d like to gather feedback from a user’s perspective.

The link to the product: https://launchtorch.io/

Looking forward to your feedback!
stories.title: Ask HN: Feedback for Feedback
